ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: It s hard;y a bug exploits. they use the arhcrey skill due to the aim factor. And the fact that they have such a pathetic damage. somthing like 1,  tends to
ygData.messageBody:
It's hard;y a bug exploits. they use the arhcrey skill due to the aim factor.
And the fact that they have such a pathetic damage. somthing like 1, tends to
suggest this. I would suggest to wait to hear back from some one in authority
before declaring something to be a bug exploit.

Inos
Veeshan


Jeremy Pollack wrote:

> From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>
>
> The tiny daggers and pine needles are *extremely likley* bugged melee
> weapons. I have seen them and tested them just enough to make sure they are
> actually bugged, and then I have /bug'd them and continued on my way. They
> are melee weapons and help in the melee slot, there is absolutely no reason
> they should help out your archery skill. It would be very cheap and possibly
> an exploit to use these.
>
> > From: Countess Bathory <countess_bathory_69@...>
> >
> > "Then grab
> > one of those needle thingy's which are like daggers but use the archery
> > skill."
> >
> > UMMM.. what needle thingys might those be?
> > And do you know where to get them in freeport?
>
